temperature_initial.description: Temperature for initial model generation. Controls diversity/randomness of valid code.

temperature_mutation.description: Temperature for mutation (evolve_model). Lower means more conservative edits.

max_concurrent_requests.description: Maximum number of concurrent LLM API requests in Parallel Mode.

max_generations.description: Maximum number of generations to run the evolution.

mutation_rate.description: Probability of choosing mutation over crossover when reproducing.

crossover_rate.description: Probability of choosing crossover. (Should theoretically sum to 1 with mutation, or be handled as ratio).

selection_temperature.description: Adaptive Scaling Factor for Softmax. effective_T = T * std(log_fitness). T=1.0 implies standard Softmax on Z-scores of log-fitness.

n_iterations_stagnation.description: Stopping criterion: number of generations without global improvement before stopping.

init_population_capacity.description: Initial number of individuals per island.

N_parents_crossover.description: Number of parents on which to perform crossover.

max_capacity_island.description: Maximum number of individuals on an island.

iter_migration.description: Number of generations between migration events.

n_local_stagnation.description: Number of generations without local improvement before an island is flagged for extinction. Should be higher than iter_migration.

overall_instructions.value: Using the problem description, reason to find a mechanistic model that could explain the observed dynamics. Do not be afraid to include non-linearities.
overall_instructions.description: Specific instructions that can be specific to the studied problem.

initial_generation.value: Propose mechanistic models that explain the observed dynamics, potentially introducing latent variables if the system seems under-specified. If you introduce latent variables, you MUST justify their physical role and explain how they drive the causal dynamics.
initial_generation.description: Instruction for the initial model generation.

mutation.value: Perform a mutation operation on these dynamics, ie Change its dynamics to propose a new ODE system. Keep the same number of variables.

crossover.value: Perform a crossover operation on the proposals given. Keep the same number of variables.

extinction_mutation.value: You are repopulating an island after extinction and are provided with an individual that performed the best in other islands. Mutate this individual creatively! Do not just change something slightly, propose a big change. Reason about the current problem context to propose a new direction of potential solutions. Do not change the number of variables in the system
extinction_mutation.description: Instruction for high-temperature mutation after extinction.

analysis.description: List of expression components to track in model fingerprints.
